welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Montgomery Village, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxury amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves mainly American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves mainly Delta and United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves mainly JetBlue and Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves a variety of airlines, including American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is home to international flights and airlines like Air Canada and Spirit.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
